Interface RoomService

All Known Implementing Classes:
RoomServiceImpl
public interface RoomService
Service interface for managing rooms.

Defines business operations for creating, retrieving, updating, and deleting rooms, as well as adding reservations to rooms and retrieving rooms by room number.

Author:
alwin roble
See Also:

    • createRoom

      Creates a new room.
      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the created room as a RoomDto

    • getRoomById

      RoomDto getRoomById(Long roomId)
      Retrieves a room by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      roomId - the ID of the room to retrieve
      Returns:
      the room as a RoomDto

    • getAllRooms

      List<RoomDto> getAllRooms()

      Returns:

      Updates the information of an existing room.
      Parameters:
      roomId - the ID of the room to update
      updatedRoom - the updated room data
      Returns:
      the updated room as a RoomDto

    • deleteRoom

      Deletes a room by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      roomId - the ID of the room to delete

    • addReservation

      RoomDto addReservation(Long roomId, String resId)
      Adds a reservation ID to the room's list of reservations.
      Parameters:
      roomId - the ID of the room
      resId - the reservation ID to add
      Returns:
      the updated room as a RoomDto

      RoomDto getRoomByNumber(String roomNumber)

      Returns:
